## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b2f97f10309683aa0addae921845bdf8ce584670d8640544b7eeb2c41501e7af)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'td-emerald-standards' @ 6.6.6 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
